name: 詹姆斯·B·梅里曼
awards: 2023年 第75届美国导演工会奖 最佳综艺/访谈/新闻/体育节目导演-特殊时段 (提名) 诺曼·利尔：跨越世纪的音乐与欢笑
name_full: 詹姆斯·B·梅里曼 James B. Merryman
birth_place: 美国,德克萨斯州,奥斯汀

last_movies.title: 奥利维亚·罗德里戈：GUTS 世界巡演全纪录
诺曼·利尔：跨越世纪的音乐与欢笑

introduction: James brings a fresh perspective and unbridled creativity to every project. Add to that his education, experience, and knack for problem solving, and it's clear why he's sought out by the best in the world from music, branded content, and live TV and events.James has worked with major recording artists and their teams to design custom performances across all genres of music. Performers like Megan Thee Stallion, Alicia Keys, Pink, Brittany Howard, Doja Cat, Olivia Rodrigo, and many more have relied on James to create bespoke pieces that tell personal stories.
